Title: How an Accidental Leader Transformed an Industry with Scott Harrison
Description:
Join us as our host, George Kamel, talks to Scott Harrison. Scott is the founder and CEO of charity: water, a nonprofit focused on bringing clean water to everyone on Earth. We talk about how he’s scaled charity: water over the past 15 years and why the best tribes are built around an enthusiastic, mission-oriented leader. Later in the episode, George chats with Jim King, executive vice president of Ramsey Education here at Ramsey Solutions. Jim explains the relationship between leadership and generosity and gives ways you can invest in your community.

 

You’ll learn:

  • Three things a CEO must do to stay in business
  • Why people don’t trust charities
  • The business model that tripled charity: water’s revenue
  • How generosity makes you an effective leader
